chapter_description.p: The Help Tools module provides functions to create, convert, and manage documentation for Nelson.

It supports generating help content in multiple formats, including HTML, Markdown, PDF, and website-ready formats, enabling developers to maintain and distribute comprehensive documentation efficiently.

keyword.name: buildhelpmd
keyword.description: Build help of Nelson's modules for GitBook.

keyword.name: buildhelpweb
keyword.description: Build help of Nelson's modules for website.

keyword.name: docroot
keyword.description: Retrieve or update the root directory for Nelson Help system.

keyword.description: Internal function to convert xml document files to html.

keyword.description: Converts xml Nelson help files to Nelson format.

keyword.description: Converts xml Nelson help files to html.

keyword.description: Converts xml Nelson help files to markdown format.
